channel.title: RXVL's Help Topic
channel.description:
I figured that since I'm on alot on these forums that I'll help the people who have problems. This is to try and reduce the ridiculus spam in this forum. Try and keep it orderly, though, [b]spam is not tolerated![/b]
Note to mod/admin: Sticky pl0x?
